reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Fitbit integration needs to re-authenticate your account

abort.wrong_account: The user credentials provided do not match this Fitbit account.

deprecated_yaml_no_import.title: Fitbit YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml_no_import.description:
Configuring Fitbit using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration was not completely setup.

Remove the `fitbit` configuration from your configuration.yaml file and remove fitbit.conf and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

deprecated_yaml_import.title: Fitbit YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml_import.description:
Configuring Fitbit using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically, including OAuth Application Credentials.

Remove the `fitbit` configuration from your configuration.yaml file and remove fitbit.conf and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The Fitbit YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring Fitbit using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the Fitbit YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and remove the fitbit.conf and continue to [set up the integration](/config/integrations/dashboard/add?domain=fitbit) manually.
